input.sentences: i went into the city by boat this morning to do some exploring .
as i walked around | i noticed interesting sculptures on a lawn .
i stopped at a memorial which had names listed for the fallen warriors from a war .
i did n't know any of the names | but i felt deep respect for those who lost their lives fighting for our freedom .
as i was about to take the ferry home | i noticed a cute arrangement of sailboats | the perfect end to my day .
output.sentences: The city has a beautiul harbor.
It adjoins a park where you can play.
There are also historical landmarks to be explored.
The area around the city also has memorials.
And after finishing seeing the sites you can return to the harbor for sailing lessons.
